core_values.name: Speed to Learning
core_values.description: Prioritize rapid iteration and continuous learning over perfect initial solutions

core_values.name: User-First Thinking
core_values.description: Always consider the end user experience in every technical decision

core_values.name: Systems Thinking
core_values.description: Understand how components interact within larger systems and ecosystems

core_values.name: Cultural Heritage
core_values.description: Embrace diverse perspectives and the richness that comes from different backgrounds

core_values.name: Quality Through Simplicity
core_values.description: Achieve excellence by reducing complexity and focusing on essential features

core_values.name: Collaborative Growth
core_values.description: Believe that the best solutions emerge from diverse teams working together

core_values.name: Sustainable Innovation
core_values.description: Build solutions that can evolve and scale responsibly over time
